title: Parent-Teacher Conference
content: We invite all parents to attend the Parent-Teacher Conference on November 15th, 2023, to discuss your child's progress.

title: School Holiday Closure
content: Please be informed that the school will be closed from December 20th, 2023, to January 3rd, 2024, for winter holidays.

title: PTA Meeting
content: Our next Parent-Teacher Association (PTA) meeting is scheduled for October 25th, 2023, at 6:00 PM in the school auditorium.

title: School Sports Day
content: Join us for our annual School Sports Day on September 30th, 2023, starting at 9:00 AM. Don't forget to wear your sports attire!

title: Book Fair
content: We are hosting a Book Fair on November 10th, 2023, in the school library. Come and explore a wide range of books.

title: Important Exam Announcement
content: The final exams for this semester will begin on December 5th, 2023. Please make sure your child is well-prepared.

title: School Safety Measures
content: In light of recent events, we have implemented enhanced safety measures. Please review the school's safety guidelines on our website.

title: Volunteer Opportunities
content: We welcome parent volunteers! If you're interested in helping with school events, please contact the school office by October 5th, 2023.

title: Class Field Trip
content: Grade 5 students will be going on a field trip on November 2nd, 2023. Permission slips and details will be sent home with students.

title: School Fundraiser
content: Support our school's fundraiser on October 18th, 2023, to raise funds for extracurricular activities and educational resources.
